name: MONOLITH-LD39
description:
My second LD game.

You are the spider-bot on hostile planet. Your goal is to reach misteryous monolith, but you dont have enought energy. Only way to reach it is to drain energy from other robots. But they will defend themselwes.

Controlls:

RMB - rotate camera

LMP - move/attack/drain energy

SPACE - load shields
